To be honest, ATS deliveries are pretty good overall.
But there are a few stations where deliveries often gets delayed or missed and we get a lot of call traffic because of this.
This happens partly because; (a) The delivery agents are not well trained, (b) Pincode(s) delivery structure is not well planned by ATS, (c) The station is mis-managed.
Amazon logistics in India still has a long way to go.
But the aggressiveness that they are showing is to be respected.
Working as an associate, I know customers who has received packages in kashmir, Orissa, nicobar islands etc.
They are always pushing the envelope.
Not to deny, they are making a lot of mistakes but just like any other company Amazon will learn and recover.
Oh and btw, Amazon fulfilled packages are also delivered by Indian postal service in the remotest of villages extending their reach to 80% of India.
So anyone with a mobile app can order an A-fulfilled product anywhere in India.
Needless to say Amazon India is pretty good.

COD(cash on delivery.here when the product is delivered to the buyer than time buyer will pay the amount.

Service Tax calculated on Commission and payment collection Fee.

It depends on the many factors.

To start with you have to select as to how you will be registered on Amazon, whether as a FBA(Fullfilled by Amazon) or MFN (Merchant Fulfilled Network). Seller who use FBS pay fees to store their products in Amazon's fulfillment centers as well as for Amazon's world-class fulfillment services.
When an order is placed for a seller's FBA product, Amazon receives the information, picks the stock from the shelves, packs it, and ships it.
Amazon also provides the customer service for all FBA products.
MFN simply refers to sellers shipping their own products directly from their own homes, businesses, or warehouses after receiving orders through online portal.
This means that locating the stock, packing the orders, arranging the shipping, and providing all customer service is the direct responsibility of the seller.
Second factor would be the type of product you want to sell.
Each product has different commission, storage and shipping rates.
For details about pricing you can refer the below link.
https://services.amazon.in/servi... Hope this helps.

Internship is not so necessary to get a job.
Let’s first understand the need of Internship pertinent to companies/startups.
Companies and especially startups hire folks to get their short-term work done by investing less amount from their pocket.
And in case if two or three turn out to be outstanding.
They are offered a full time job.
This way companies end up saving money, picking out the right candidates, and getting their work done.
Now, think from the candidates point of view.
Why do we do internship? To get the exposure of professional world.
To build and enhance skills.
To make some money.
To put it on CV for making it look cool.
:) Consider, you are an intern at company ‘X’ working on Technology ‘T’. You have done tremendous job and got lots of achievement award too.
After your internship is over, you want to work in company ‘Y’ as a full time hire.
You applied for the position and got the interview arranged.
During interview you get to know the company ‘Y’ uses ‘Z’ technology different than the one you have worked on.
So there you are left with your experience.
Only your experience will take you through the interview process because perhaps an interviewer doesn’t know about your previous technology you had worked on.
In the end, your experience and way of tackling the problem matter.
Though talent is also admirable.

Are you looking for a dating advice, then why did you mention yourself an average guy? If you ask me then I would say if you prepare each and every question of GeeksforGeeks thoroughly then it can even land you up in companies far more better than Amazon.
You can even beat the interview rounds of Google and Facebook too.
Understand the concepts behind every question, don’t just sit back and start mugging up like we prepare for our semester exams in one-night study.
You can’t make a baby in a month making nine women pregnant.
Learning will take time.
Concepts will definitely take time to settle down in your mind which will bring out the confidence to speak afterwards.
Do check out the interview experiences of the folks on GeeksforGeeks.

Hi, They have Own Market Place for shipping like E-Kart & ATS.
Both company is provide shipping facility to vendor account.
when vendor completed order process on his account . it shown in his shipping providers account & then send Pick boy on vendors pickup address which is registered in vendors account.

vendor will ready order with shipping document (manifest, Required if movement of goods within the State or goods moving outside the State form). Then pickup boy will pick parcel with vendors place & ship with shipping provider to customers near by warehouse.
After that local delivery boy reach to customer address and completed the order.
Being an online seller we are qualified to answer this question.
Amazon is pretty faster in delivering orders as it has its own courier service.

Amazon has two types of delivery services Amazon Easy ship -In this type of shipping they ask seller to make the parcel ready in Amazon provided packaging material.The address and other docs are attached with the parcel at the premises of seller.The courier guy from Amazon are very professional and will come on time to pick up the parcel.If the seller fails to handover the parcel on time then Amazon gives negative ratings to the seller.Rating is very important for a seller on market places.

Another delivery service is  Amazon prime  wherein the material is kept at nearest Amazon warehouse(Amazon charges nominal fee from the seller for the same).Amazon has excellent network of its warehouses and pick up facilities across the country.
Prime is faster than easy ship.
Amazon is highly customer oriented and takes utmost care in delivering the parcel.They will call you for feedback after the parcel is delivered.
The delivery from Flipkart is not as faster as that of Amazon.
Standard Delivery : Flipkart also has its own courier service  Ekart . The service of Ekart is not fast.
They lack that professionalism which we see in Amazon guys.The return rate is more in case of Flipkart due to late delivery.
FA(Flipkart Assured):-  This is comparatively better than standard delivery.
Flipkart Assured badge is not an entitlement or a privilege.
Neither is it available to select customers or select sellers.
The Flipkart Assured badge is accorded by an algorithm, developed by Flipkart data scientists, which computes key product and seller metrics along with stringent quality parameters.
Only select products from Flipkart’s most trusted and reliable sellers qualify for a badge.
A product is eligible to earn the Flipkart Assured badge only if it passes extensive checks on seller and product quality as well as availability of faster shipping.
Overall Amazon has faster delivery than Flipkart.

Amazon great Indian sale offers 2017 Amazon is offering special discounts under a limited-period promotional scheme starting later this week.
Under its "Great Indian Sale", the US-based e-commerce major is offering discounts up to 80 per cent off on a multitude of items including clothing, mobiles, kitchen appliances and other electronics.
The Amazon India sales offer will open from May 11 to May 14, according to its website.
"Gear up for the biggest sale! 11th May will be all about big deals on big brands! #AmazonGreatIndianSale," Amazon India said on Twitter.

Products being offered at special prices under the Amazon Great Indian Sale include major brands such as Adidas, Puma, Levi's, Samsung, Lenovo, LG, Fastrack, Prestige, Voltas, Bajaj and Bombay Dyeing, Amazon India further said on its website.

Following are my reasons Lower trust on sellers.
I trust flipkart, but not its sellers.
Same with snapdeal.
I used to buy about Rs 60k worth goods every year online.
In 2012 etc, I almost always preferred flipkart.
Though we had infibeam etc.
(Even they are good). But those days, I was sure of the quality of the product I get.
I see  WS Retail,  and then buy.
No doubts in mind.
Now, I am at the mercy of the seller.
Ofourse some would be good - I guess TechComRetail etc.
but they hardly have many things.
On Amazon, though situation is same, I can trust cloudtail, primac retail, olympia etc.
because of huge number of genuine reviews.
They could have implemented strict quality control (seal checking etc) and warehousing(like amazon fulfilled), but they allowed sellers to fool their customers.

Diluted strong fundamentals . If I were to analyse Flipkart from how they started to what they are - one thing is clear -  they used to prioritize core things like - quality, delivery, customer service  etc.
during initial days.
Now a days, those took a back seat, and it is marketing, gimmicks and similar BS.
Low choice inventory.
I used to be able to buy my computer components like internal hard disk etc from WS Retails.
Now many of the ciompnents are not even listed by the sellers.
In short, flipkart has changed form a  upmarket midsized high quality supermarket to xxxxl-sized low quality fish market.

Recalling one of the incidents which happened when I was in Amazon- An irate customer whose JBL pulse speaker was not delivered on time.
Mr Customer was waiting for more than a week for it now and lost his nerve on me.
Normally we ask a customer who miss a delivery date to wait for 24–48hrs for the logistics people to redeliver with the next consignment.

However Mr Customer not happy to wait and demands a refund, I walk up to my manager, instead of refund he orders another Pulse speaker for the customer, assured customer that there will be a second package sent in a speed delivery by 24hrs and a refund is highly impossible, customer agrees.
Later on followed up customer's account to see he gets two packages, one which he originally ordered and another one which we gave.
Imagine the customer's  word of mouth for Amazon .

Amazon India is doing many interesting things for it's customers in India.
Last year in 2016, Amazon has launched Amazon Global Store.

Amazon Pantry has wide range of Groceries and other house hold products which can be brought online and get them home delivered the next day.
Amazon Pantry is now limited to 28 cities which will be growing in the coming years.
Amazon Now, using this groceries and many house hold products can be purchased online and the Delivery will be done in 2 hours.
This is now limited to major cities like Banglore, Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Hyderabad.
Amazon Prime : Amazon Prime membership has many benefits which include 1 Day and 2 day delivery on eligible products for free, same day delivery at a discounted price.

Other than this there are many interesting things that Amazon India is doing to reach out to many customers all across the country.
Amazon is tieing up with many carriers so that they can deliver products to all corners of the country.
Now you can order anything you want online on Amazon and get the product delivered in a very rural area.
Most of the rural area Delivery are done by India Post as IPS is our country's biggest courier service.
Amazon is thriving very hard to be the best e-commerce company in India and has been doing many interesting things.

There is a  NEW TRICK  going on  Amazon  now a days to cheat people.
Happened with me.
A product will be shown as excessively discounted.
For example, I was looking for Crocs shoes, MRP 6000, they were available on sale at whopping Rs.2000, I knew it is a good deal so I purchased the product.

As a human psychology if you purchase one product you also purchase many other products may be somewhat cheaper and lying for a long time from your wish list (also to avoid delivery charges). Now the real work begins - The order for heavily discounted product will be  Cancelled  saying it is not available in inventory (then why it was showing available in the first place?) and the other products will be delivered.
Now if you have not purchased the cancelled product you probably would have ignored the other products also, but by looking at heavily discounted product you purchased other products as well.
In this way wrong pricing of a dummy product can be used to instigate you to buy other products.
The reason of Amazon being so famous are its 14 Leadership Principles.
And out of all the most kind of important one is  “Customer Obsession”  which says: Leaders start with the customer and work backwards.
They work vigorously to earn and keep customer trust.
Although leaders pay attention to competitors, they obsess over customers.
This is something every person inside the Amazon is expected to follow.
Therefore, whenever Amazon’s Customer Care Associates get a call from customers they talk politely and humbly.
Keeping in mind, customer satisfaction is the top most thing to achieve and rest will come later.

Well here is the thing, I am ex Seller support Associate below were my observation.
When you contact seller support there are two main seller support layers.

Outsourced Seller Support Associates Amazon direct Seller Support Associates Outsourced agents work for Amazon on second party pay rolls and have very limited tools, so they only handle basic sellers query.
Whereas the Amazon direct Seller Support associates are very well equipped and can resolve most of the seller queries.
They are well paid and trained in house by Amazon.
They work from HYD and BLR site offices.
Usually all associates are trained to provide best seller experience, but sometimes I noticed due to above limitation the Outsourced Seller Support Associates are unable to meet seller expectation.

Conclusion:  If you have bad experience, you can ask them to tranfer call to main site in HYD or BLR where you can speak with direct Amazon associate, if still unhappy you can ask them to connect to their managers.
